document_data.mainbody:
Gravedigger Karcen was a member of The Guild from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Karcen was tall and strong human man with dark skin and curly brown hair. He wore a breastplate and carried a longsword.
In the , Gravedigger Karcen served Nine-Fingers Keene as a muscle and could be often found in the Undercellar where The Guilds Guildhall was hidden. During the Absolute crisis, Karcen stood alongside Nine-Fingers during the attempt of Zhentarim takeover of the weakened Guild. The conflicts outcome was unrecorded, and neither was Karcens survival.
